description: On the roster as an exempt international player. See https://www.nfl.com/news/what-is-the-international-player-pathway for details

On the retired from football list
Rarely used, tends to indicate a cut player who is a restricted free agent.

Rarely used, tends to indicate a player released from being on the injured reserve list

Player has been released and is an unrestricted free agent
